resources.string: Spencer Maginsky has a Bachelors of Science degree in Computer Science from Roger Williams University. While he was completing his junior year as an undergrad he got an internship at Bay Computer Associates where he worked for a year as an intern, before joining the Software Engineering team full-time for another year. After his time at BCA, he began researching masters programs and enrolled in the Software Engineering and Development program at Pace University NYC, and it set to graduate May 2026.
I like fishing, snowboarding, outdoor walks, video game, and can solve a rubik"'s" cube in under a minute.
